pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate Data from State Space Models // Provides a streamlined and user-friendly framework for simulating data in state space models, particularly when the number of subjects/units (n) exceeds one, a scenario commonly encountered in social and behavioral sciences. This package was designed to generate data for the simulations performed in Pesigan, Russell, and Chow (2025) doi:10.1037/met0000779.
